text: Mackenzie Frances Ziegler (born June 4, 2004) is an American dancer, actress, model, and singer.Gisoni, Melissa. "Mackenzie Ziegler" , Maddie & Mackenzie Ziegler, accessed December 26, 2016 She first got noticed as a child while appearing for six years on the Lifetime reality dance series Dance Moms with her older sister, Maddie Ziegler, who is a dancer and actress.
